channel.title: phar on Don B. Stringham
channel.description: Recent content in phar on Don B. Stringham

item.title: Building a PHAR for a PHP project
item.description: Building a PHAR for a PHP project! Some in the PHP community have said the PHP developers have too much Java envy. I am not exactly sure what they mean. As long as PHP adopts good practices from Java development I am all for it! One of the practices that I am glad that is now in PHP is the single PHAR archive for PHP applications.

item.title: PHAR's and file path's
item.description: Beware a PHAR requires absolute paths! Hopefully, this post save a PHP developer some time.
